title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 14.3 - Authority of empire zone designation board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 14.3 - Authority of empire zone designation board

State Regulations
(a) The Empire Zone Designation Board shall
evaluate the merits of the appeal. The Empire Zone Designation Board shall
consider the notice of appeal provided by the business enterprise, but shall
only reserve the determination to revoke the business enterprise's
certification if the Empire Zone Designation Board unanimously finds that there
was sufficient evidence presented demonstrating that the commissioner's
finding, with respect to section
11.9
(c)(2)
of this

Title was in error, or that, with respect to section
11.9
(c)(1)
of this

Title, any extraordinary circumstances occurred which would justify the
continued certification of the business enterprise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
14.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
